metadata.dc:author: Piva, J R
Cejas, H
metadata.dc:description: The authors study salivary and cutaneous mixed tumors in a comparative way. They use silver impregnation techniques, specially those developed in spanish and argentine schools. As a result, they obtain a morphological richness using those techniques. One of these, specially Del Rio Hortega-Polak allow to document the preponderant role of the myoepithelial cells in the genesis of these tumors.
metadata.dc:title: Acerca de los denominados "tumores mixtos" de las glándulas salivales y cutáneas. Caracterización con técnicas argénticas.
[Mixed tumors of the salivary and cutaneous glands. Studied by silver technics].
